summary: The diff fully implements REQ-1. A navigation link to the Figma design site was added to Nav.tsx, opening in a new tab with proper security attributes. The link appears in both desktop and mobile navigation views alongside existing links, following the same pattern as the 'Reflect & Create' external link.

hallucinated_features.description: The Figma link was labeled 'Design Inspiration' rather than using a neutral label like 'Figma' or 'Design'
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify what label text to use for the navigation link. The implementation chose 'Design Inspiration' which adds semantic meaning not requested in the requirements.
